column4: i am trying to install dvdrip in hoary, but it says that it needs transcode then it complains that transcode cannot be installed.  how do i get transcode on here?
i had to compile it by hand
awesome
what hdwre are u running?
it's just a laptop.  TMO lost my computer...
well if its x86, then you might be able to find a repo, but i recommend apt-building from source
ah, yes, it's x86.  is the source package available on apt?
it should be
you're gonna boot up a windoze box?
lol
you got multiverse, universe?
yes
welcome to the world of source building
yeah, i'm quite familiary with it...i just can't find those libraries anywhere.  projectmayo is dead.
how bout the source of those libs?
hold on, let me check
iow, are they "apt-get source -b <pkgname>"-able?
i tried apt-get source divx*      nada
how bout *divx*
nothing
hang on a minim
i have slept, were we discussing something of import?
i think the last thing we were talking about is how badly the military handles their computers...and taxis
yes, the taxi version of win2k will never grace my hack
